"Kochi Metro.

"
"The introduction of the Metro Rail is expected to change the entire face of Kochi with " "the residents of Kochi having quicker and better access to their jobs, business,education," "livelihood, entertainment and other social activities..

"
"The strategic goal of the Kochi Metro Rail project is to increase the quality of life of " "Kochi citizens by providing mobility to large numbers of people to reach their " "destinations in a short span of time. Its main aim is to encourage the residents of Kochi" "to use a more economic and eco-friendly alternative to public transport thereby reducing " "overcrowding, traffic congestion, transit time as well as the noise and air pollution " "caused by the ever growing traffic of Kochi.

"
"The Kochi Metro app by Citrus Informatics aims to augment this project by helping people " "travelling by the metro, find their way around Kochi very easily.You no longer need to " " ask anyone for directions to places you want to go to. While waiting for your station to " "approach, you can quickly find the restaurants, hospitals, movies and even ATMs near " "your station.

"
"And if you are travelling by road and want to get on the metro, the app can help you find " "the nearest metro station. And what's more - you can get to know the tentative fare " "information to your destination, distance between the stations and the number of " "intermediate stations.

" "Just like the metro helps transport people faster, the Kochi metro app helps people find " "and reach their destinations faster.

"
